Detailed Description

Class for testing that CHP files are the same +/- some epsilon.

Also checks to make sure that at least some of the headers are the same (times/dates/versions change so not checked).

Parameters:
generated ///
gold the reference data to compare with ///
diffAllowed the number of differences allowed (default 0) ///
prefix the prefix for the header string alg part ///
eps epsilon [confidence, pvalue] i.e. if |gen-gold| >= frac*max(|gen|,|gold|) then there is a difference. ///
bCheckHeaders Check headers? (boolean, default: true). ///
frac maximum accepted fractional difference in numeric values (not used by default). /// i.e. if |gen-gold| >= frac*max(|gen|,|gold|) then there is a difference.
